title: BitSwapNow
author: BitSwapNow
content: Exchange bitcoin and over 350+ digital currencies instantly. Custodian free swap service that is safe, quick and easy. You can cross chain swap say like eth for bnb. All rates are transparent and we offer some of the lowest crypto swap rates in the industry. Purchase and or sell crypto with credit or debit cards as well. No sign up and all funds are safe as it is a wallet-less exchange.Powered by some of the largest crypto exchanges and defi platforms, BitSwapNow has over 350+ supported coins. With huge ties to this liquidity we offer the options to swap cross chain assets like BTC to BNB or ETH to XMR. You can also buy and sell crypto with supported banks and debit/credit cards as well.We also syndicate crypto related, blockchain and NFT news from the industry. Please use our service and let your friends know too!If anyone has any questions or comments please feel free to drop a comment below.https://bitswapnow.com

comments.author: BitSwapNow
comments.body: Because there is no need to sign up. There is no KYC unless there is a high risk transaction then which it will be done through a 3rd party provider. This is not a scam this is simply a new business. Please dont make accusations that are not true. Also the funds are always stored in your wallet we do not handle any funds everything is decentralized. Also some exchanges or tokens are not easily accessible to certain people such as BNB. An uniswap or pancake swap can not do ETH to BNB cross chain swaps. Hope that helps.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Quote from: BitSwapNow on May 11, 2022, 10:26:57 PMAlso the funds are always stored in your wallet we do not handle any funds everything is decentralized. How is it decentralized? It is not. Is it not an instant exchange? A buyer or seller will send coin from there wallet to the address you will provide them which is under your control. For reputed instant exchanges, the coins can be freezed, but for new instant exchange like yours, the coin can be stolen by you. All centralized on the instant exchange owner. It is not decentralized at all, you have the control once anyone send coin to the address provided, a means to freeze or steal the coin and the reason it is centralized.

comments.author: BitSwapNow
comments.body: It is not under our control as we work with other services liquidity. Everything happens on chain.

comments.author: BitSwapNow
comments.body: An that is not true. As in we cannot stop or freeze or steal coins. That is the plus side to this. But the down side is just like any crypto or blockchain related transaction is its irreversible. So if you enter the wrong address then yes your coins will be lost most likely unless there is a return to sender protocol built into whatever coin you are trying to send to ect. There are other similar services and I do understand your concerns but again this is a project and service Ive been working on recently and yes it is new. It will take time to garner trust for sure. I am also in the works of a good press release coming out and syndicating on a bunch of popular news and finance sites as well as other offsite SEO and marketing strategies. I appreciate the feedback.
